name: cloud-sdk-timesheet-app
description: Timesheet app using the SAP Cloud SDK and Express.js

scripts.clean: rm -f package-lock.json && find . -name "node_modules" -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find db/src -name "gen" -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name "sqlite.db" -exec rm -rf '{}' + && npm i
scripts.ci-build: npx tsc && npm run cds-deploy && cp -r src/app db srv dist/
scripts.ci-package: mkdir -p deployment/ && cp -r dist package.json package-lock.json index.html dist/db dist/srv sqlite.db deployment/
scripts.ci-backend-unit-test: nyc --extension .ts --report-dir ./s4hana_pipeline/reports/coverage-reports/backend-unit/ --reporter cobertura mocha -r ts-node/register -r dotenv/config test/unit-tests/**/*.spec.ts test/unit-tests/*.spec.ts --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./s4hana_pipeline/reports/backend-unit/results.xml
scripts.ci-it-backend: npm run cds-deploy:local && nyc --extension .ts --report-dir ./s4hana_pipeline/reports/coverage-reports/backend-integration/ --reporter cobertura mocha -r ts-node/register -r dotenv/config test/integration-tests/**/*.spec.ts --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./s4hana_pipeline/reports/backend-integration/results.xml
